name: i18n-manager
description: Easy i18n Manager is an intuitive and efficient application designed to simplify the management of i18n files (JSON format). Perfect for developers and translators, it allows you to edit, organize, and validate translation files effortlessly. With a user-friendly interface, the app provides features like key comparison between different locales, syntax validation, and export/import options. Streamline your localization workflow and ensure consistent translations across your projects.

i18nManager.jsonSpace.description: A String or Number that's used to insert white space into the output JSON

i18nManager.lineEnding.description: String used to signify the end of a line

i18nManager.supportedFolders.description: An array of folder names that's used to open the extension through the right click (restart required after changing the value)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
